TopicTitle: Unknown Object On Mun Surface And Question Reguarding Steam Mods

Articles.Content:
Hello my fellow Engineerpilotpeople. I was trying to land a kethane mining rig on the Mun, and on my way saw a shack-like Mun-coloured object somewhat far away. Unfortunately I didn't have enough Delta-V to both investigate it and then head to the kethane pocket that I had failed to land at. Does anyone know what this object is?

And for the Steam mods question: I have installed the Kethane mod and MechJeb, and wish to play vanilla KSP now, but reinstalling and verifying my game cache isn't removing the mods. Does anyone know how to remove them?

Thanks. ~Akhar
Perhaps you saw the base of the Neil Armstrong monument?

You might have seen an Anomaly, maybe the memorial for a famous astronaut. As for clearing mods, you need to find the game directory and then delete the remaining files after uninstalling the game. It will be somewhere in the Steam directory. Something like...

Program files\steam\steamapps\common\KSP

Perhaps you saw the base of the Neil Armstrong monument?

Ah, now that I think about it it could well have been the base of a monument. Thank you!

You might have seen an Anomaly, maybe the memorial for a famous astronaut. As for clearing mods, you need to find the game directory and then delete the remaining files after uninstalling the game. It will be somewhere in the Steam directory. Something like...

Program files\steam\steamapps\common\KSP

Thank you as well! You helpful people just made my day.

hey i also spotted a object during reentry and i didn't know what was it and when i go to map view its not debris:confused:

The first thing pop into my mind was a unidentified flying object or you can call it a ufo

hey i also spotted a object during reentry and i didn't know what was it and when i go to map view its not debris:confused:

That's probably minmus

hey i also spotted a object during reentry and i didn't know what was it and when i go to map view its not debris:confused:

-snip-

It's probably a munolith. Where are you re-entering?
Pics and coords help, as there's a few anomalies on the Mun
It looks like Minmus, but I'm not sure if it is Minmus.

As for the Steam issue, I'm betting you'll have to go into the steam folder and manually delete the files and folders for the mods. Steam doesn't seem to delete everything when it "uninstalls" a game. In case you don't know where the game folder is, on my machine the path is C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\
